site.title: MilloColor - Premium Automotive Paint Solutions
site.description: High-quality automotive paint solutions for professionals. Distributor of premium European paints with 30+ years of experience.

hero.title: Coloring the Future
hero.headline: The Future of Automotive Paint
hero.tagline: Experience unmatched quality and brilliance with MilloColor's premium finishes
hero.subtitle: Premium automotive paint solutions for professionals

about.title: About MilloColor
about.subtitle: 30+ Years of Excellence in Automotive Paint Solutions

history.title: Our History
history.paragraph1: Founded in 1990, MilloColor began as a small distributor of European automotive paints. Today, we're a leading provider of premium paint solutions, with a presence in over 20 countries worldwide.
history.paragraph2: Through dedication to quality and innovation, we've built strong partnerships with the world's most respected paint manufacturers, allowing us to bring cutting-edge products to our customers.

mission.title: Our Mission & Values
mission.paragraph: At MilloColor, we believe in delivering excellence through quality products, expert knowledge, and exceptional service. Our mission is to elevate the standard of automotive finishing worldwide.

value1.title: Excellence
value1.description: We are committed to excellence in everything we do, from product quality to customer service.

value2.title: Innovation
value2.description: We continuously seek new technologies and methods to improve performance and results.

value3.title: Sustainability
value3.description: We are dedicated to environmentally responsible practices and products.

team.title: Our Team
team.paragraph1: Our team consists of industry experts with decades of combined experience in automotive painting and refinishing. Many are former painters, technicians, and color specialists who understand your challenges firsthand.
team.paragraph2: This practical expertise allows us to provide not just products, but solutions tailored to the specific needs of professional painters and body shops.

future.title: Looking Forward
future.paragraph: As we continue to grow, our focus remains on bringing the latest innovations and highest quality products to our customers. We're excited about the future of automotive finishing and our role in shaping it.

product6.name: EcoBase Waterborne

products.ctaText: Our team of experts can help you find the perfect products for your specific needs and applications.
products.whyChooseUsSubtitle: Discover what sets our products apart in the automotive refinishing industry.

performance.title: Superior Performance
performance.description: Exceptional durability, color accuracy, and finish consistency.

precision.title: Color Precision
precision.description: Advanced color matching technology for perfect results every time.

global.title: Global Standards
global.description: Meeting international automotive industry standards and regulations.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Cutting-edge formulations with the latest automotive coating technologies.

support.title: Expert Support
support.description: Comprehensive technical support and training from industry experts.

brands.title: Our Partner Brands
brands.subtitle: We partner with the world's leading paint manufacturers to bring you premium quality products

brand1.name: ColorTech Pro
brand1.description: High-performance automotive paint systems from Germany
brand1.fullDescription: ColorTech Pro is a premium German paint manufacturer with over 75 years of experience in developing high-performance automotive coatings. Their products are known for exceptional durability, brilliant finish, and advanced color-matching technology.

features.feature3: Outstanding resistance to weathering and chemicals

brand2.name: ItalFinish
brand2.description: Italian luxury finishes for premium vehicles
brand2.fullDescription: ItalFinish brings Italian craftsmanship to automotive refinishing with products specifically designed for luxury and high-end vehicles. Their coatings deliver extraordinary depth, clarity, and a finish that enhances the most prestigious automotive designs.

features.feature1: Specialized formulations for luxury vehicle brands
features.feature3: Custom effect additives for unique finishes

brand3.name: EcoPaint Systems
brand3.description: Sustainable coating solutions with reduced environmental impact
brand3.fullDescription: EcoPaint Systems focuses on developing environmentally responsible coatings that maintain professional quality while reducing VOC emissions and environmental impact. Their innovative products meet or exceed the strictest environmental regulations.

brand4.name: TechCoat Industrial
brand4.fullDescription: TechCoat Industrial specializes in heavy-duty coating systems for commercial vehicles, fleet applications, and industrial equipment. Their products offer superior protection against extreme conditions, chemicals, and physical wear.

features.feature3: Extended service life even in harsh environments

global.title: Global Distribution Network
global.description: Our products are available in over 50 countries through a network of certified distributors and partners

europe.name: Europe
europe.description: Our strongest presence with distribution in 25 countries
europe.countries: Germany, Italy, France, UK, Spain and more

americas.name: The Americas
americas.description: Growing network throughout North and South America
americas.countries: USA, Canada, Brazil, Mexico and more

asia.name: Asia Pacific
asia.description: Expanding presence in key Asian markets
asia.countries: Japan, South Korea, Australia, New Zealand and more

hero.title: Professional Services
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive support for automotive refinishing professionals

overview.title: How We Support You
overview.description: Beyond providing premium products, we offer a range of professional services to help you achieve perfect results and grow your business.

colorConsulting.title: Color Consulting
colorConsulting.shortDescription: Expert color matching and formulation services for even the most challenging applications.
colorConsulting.description: Our color consulting service provides professional assistance with complex color matching challenges. Our experts use advanced spectrophotometer technology and extensive color libraries to develop precise formulations for any project, from classic restorations to custom finishes.

benefits.benefit1: Precise color matching for factory and custom colors
benefits.benefit2: Specialized expertise for rare, vintage, and difficult-to-match colors
benefits.benefit3: Custom formula development for unique projects

training.title: Technical Training
training.shortDescription: Comprehensive training programs for painters and technicians at all skill levels.
training.description: Our technical training programs are designed to enhance the skills and knowledge of automotive refinishing professionals. From beginners to experienced painters, we offer hands-on workshops, technique seminars, and certification courses to help you master our products and the latest application methods.

benefits.benefit3: Advanced color theory and matching skills

equipment.title: Equipment Solutions
equipment.shortDescription: High-performance spray equipment and color mixing systems optimized for our products.
equipment.description: We offer a complete range of professional spray equipment, mixing systems, and accessories specifically selected and optimized for use with our paint products. Our equipment solutions focus on precision, efficiency, and consistent results to enhance your workflow.

benefits.benefit2: Customized spray gun setup and optimization
benefits.benefit3: Computerized mixing systems with advanced color management

support.title: Technical Support
support.shortDescription: Responsive assistance from our team of refinishing experts whenever you need it.
support.description: Our dedicated technical support team is always available to assist with product questions, application challenges, or troubleshooting. With decades of combined experience in automotive refinishing, our support specialists can help you resolve issues quickly and efficiently.

process.title: Our Service Process
process.description: We follow a structured approach to ensure we deliver exactly what you need

step1.title: Initial Consultation
step1.description: We begin with a detailed discussion of your needs, challenges, and objectives to understand how we can best support you.

step2.title: Customized Solution
step2.description: Our team develops a tailored plan that addresses your specific requirements, whether it's training, color consulting, or equipment setup.

step3.title: Implementation
step3.description: We deliver the agreed services with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring you receive maximum value and practical benefits.

step4.title: Follow-up Support
step4.description: Our relationship continues with ongoing support to address any questions or additional needs that arise after the initial service.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Hear from professionals who have benefited from our services

testimonial1.name: Michael Johnson
testimonial1.text: The color consulting service from MilloColor has been a game-changer for our custom restoration projects. Their ability to match decades-old factory colors is nothing short of amazing.

testimonial2.name: Sarah Rodriguez
testimonial2.text: The technical training we received has significantly improved our efficiency and finish quality. Our painters are now more confident and capable with even the most challenging jobs.

testimonial3.name: David Chen
testimonial3.text: The equipment solutions and setup assistance from MilloColor have reduced our material consumption while improving our finish quality. The return on investment was almost immediate.

student1.name: Arben Krasniqi
student1.text: The training program completely transformed my approach to automotive painting. Professional and comprehensive.

student2.name: Lena Shabani

student3.name: Driton Berisha

trusted.title: Trusted by Professionals Across Albania
trusted.description: From Tirana to Durrës, Vlorë to Shkodër, MilloColor has been the go-to source for automotive painting professionals. Our commitment to quality, innovation, and customer success has made us the leading distributor in the region.

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your

productShowcase.title: Featured Products
productShowcase.subtitle: Discover our premium automotive paint solutions engineered for professional excellence and superior results

premiumCoating.name: RUPES Skorpio III RH356
premiumCoating.description: Professional random orbital pneumatic sander with 150mm pad and 6mm orbit. Features engineered motor for maximum torque, extremely low vibration, and quiet operation.
premiumCoating.features: 6mm orbit for perfect balance|0-11,000 RPM|Anti-slip rubber coating|Double row bearings

professionalSystem.name: Roberlo Professional Spray Gun
professionalSystem.description: High-precision automotive spray gun with advanced atomization technology. Designed for professional refinishing with superior finish quality and material efficiency.
professionalSystem.features: Advanced atomization|High transfer efficiency|Precision control|Professional finish

specialtyEffects.name: SATAjet X 5500
specialtyEffects.description: Revolutionary paint spray gun with X nozzle system. Features whispering nozzle technology, optimized material distribution, and exceptional atomization for all paint systems.
specialtyEffects.features: Revolutionary X nozzle system|Whispering nozzle technology|Material savings|360° perfect finish

ecoSolutions.name: RUPES BigFoot LHR21 Mark V
ecoSolutions.description: Premium random orbital polisher with large diameter movement. Features brushless motor technology, exceptional balance, and professional-grade performance.
ecoSolutions.features: Brushless motor technology|Large orbit movement|Exceptional balance|Professional performance

industrialGrade.name: SATAjet 5000 B
industrialGrade.description: Versatile HVLP/RP spray gun with adjustable inlet pressure and painting distance. Perfect for automotive refinishing with consistent fan size across nozzle spectrum.
industrialGrade.features: HVLP/RP technology|Adjustable pressure|Consistent fan size|Professional results

customFinishes.name: Roberlo Custom Application System
customFinishes.description: Tailored spray application solutions for unique requirements. Features modular design, precision control, and expert consultation for custom applications.
